revision.text:
The '''Directory''' is a structure in the wad that contains the names, sizes(in bytes) and offsets of every [[Lump]] in the wad. Technically it can be anywhere in the file, but most editors place it at the end.
The directory is laid out like this for each entry: * 4 bytes: an unsigned long integer for the offset in the file to the lump * 4 bytes: an unsigned long integer for the size of the lump * 8 bytes for the name of the lump ([[Doomstring]]) [[Category:Glossary]]
